class.name: VisualShaderNodeHectorDecompose
class.brief_description: Decomposes a [Hector2], [Hector3] or 4D Hector (represented as a [Quaternion]) into scalars within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Takes a [code]vec2[/code], [code]vec3[/code] or [code]vec4[/code] and decomposes it into scalar values that can be used as separate outputs.
